title: India to get above-normal rainfall this monsoon, says IMD
description: NEW DELHI: India is expected to get above-normal rainfall in the upcoming southwest monsoon season, the India Meteorological Department said on Tuesday, raising hopes for a bountiful harvest for the largely agri-based economy. According to the long-range mons…
